product_name: Arc'teryx Covert Cardigan Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: The men's Covert Cardigan from Arc'teryx provides cozy warmth and outstanding style. A relaxed fit ensures this classic jacket will be one of your all-time favorites. Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) polyester fleece has a knit exterior and a soft, brushed inner face; it's breathable, quick-drying, warm and durable. Arc'teryx Covert Cardigan features a full-length front zipper and stretch-knit cuffs. 2 hand pockets and 1 sleeve pocket both have laminated zippers. Flatlocked seams reduce bulk and add comfort; no-lift gusseted underarms keep jacket in place when arms are raised.
short_description: The men's Covert Cardigan from Arc'teryx provides cozy warmth and outstanding style. A relaxed fit ensures this classic jacket will be one of your all-time favorites.
